Comments_List: learned all about mixed methods research

I think this course has changed my perspective on Mixed Methods in a helpful and positive way.  I gained insight and an appreciation on the potential contributions that Mixed Methods can offer to the field of science.

Strengths:  Good readings, good examples of mixed methods studies that we executed well and poorly.

Weakness:  None really. The discussions were engaging and candid.  Overall, I enjoyed the course.
